quotes.text: I am not your savior. I am not your friend. I am an ageless warrior bred for battle.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: Faith is a gift. It's not supposed to be easy.
quotes.author: Shotgun Mary

quotes.text: The only way to fight evil is to face it head on.
quotes.author: Father Vincent

quotes.text: I believe in you. You are the one who will save us all.
quotes.author: Cardinal Duretti

quotes.text: Sometimes the only way to find the light is to walk through the darkness.
quotes.author: Beatrice

quotes.text: I have walked the path of the warrior, and I have never looked back.
quotes.author: Shotgun Mary

quotes.text: I thought the Church was supposed to be a beacon of hope. But all I see is darkness.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: Faith can move mountains, but doubt can create them.
quotes.author: Father Vincent

quotes.text: We are all warriors. Some of us just don't know it yet.
quotes.author: Shotgun Mary

quotes.text: You can't run from your destiny. The only way out is through it.
quotes.author: Cardinal Duretti

quotes.text: Death is not the end. It's only the beginning.
quotes.author: Sister Shannon

quotes.text: The best way to fight the devil is with a demon.
quotes.author: Father Vincent

quotes.text: We are all sinners. But some of us have been given a second chance.
quotes.author: Mother Superion

quotes.text: The heart can be broken, but it can also be mended.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: You cannot outrun your past. You can only face it head-on.
quotes.author: Shotgun Mary

quotes.text: Faith is not about believing in something. It's about fighting for something.
quotes.author: Father Vincent

quotes.text: The light shines brightest in the darkest of places.
quotes.author: Beatrice

quotes.text: The warrior must have the courage to face his own fears.
quotes.author: Sister Lilith

quotes.text: The devil is a coward. He preys on the weak and the vulnerable.
quotes.author: Father Vincent

quotes.text: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
quotes.author: Cardinal Duretti

quotes.text: The path of the warrior is never easy, but it is always worth it.
quotes.author: Shotgun Mary

quotes.text: Sometimes you have to let go of the past in order to embrace the future.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: The true test of a warrior is not how he lives, but how he dies.
quotes.author: Father Vincent

quotes.text: Faith is not a shield. It's a sword.
quotes.author: Cardinal Duretti

quotes.text: The darkness cannot survive in the presence of light.
quotes.author: Sister Shannon

quotes.text: Sometimes the hardest battles are the ones we fight within ourselves.
quotes.author: Shotgun Mary

quotes.text: Fear is the enemy of faith.
quotes.author: Father Vincent

quotes.text: The warrior does not fight because he hates what is in front of him. He fights because he loves what is behind him.
quotes.author: Sister Lilith

quotes.text: The past is gone. The future is yet to be written. The present is all we have.
quotes.author: Beatrice

quotes.text: We all have our scars. But it's the wounds that heal that make us stronger.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: I have always believed that faith is a gift. But sometimes it feels like a curse
quotes.author: Beatrice

quotes.text: The path to salvation is not an easy one, but it is a noble one.
quotes.author: Beatrice

quotes.text: Don't hate who you are, who you are is beautiful
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: Pain is what made me a sister warrior.
quotes.author: Beatrice

quotes.text: Life has a way of making your dreams come tru.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: Praise God and kick some ass!
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: One water for the wild man
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: Dude, I'm a nun
quotes.author: Sister Camila

quotes.text: I really hope I got God's message right
quotes.author: Sister Camila

quotes.text: You're saying some random, formerly dead civilian is out there with an angel's Halo inside her?
quotes.author: Sister Lilith

quotes.text: BITCH
quotes.author: Ava Silva

quotes.text: One small sip for nuns, one giant drink for nunkind
quotes.author: Ava and Beatrice

quotes.text: Baby girl, I have two shotguns! When you have two shotguns you don't need combat skills.
quotes.author: Shotgun Mary

quotes.text: You all stand between me and Ava, I offer mercy to whoever walk away now. Stay and you will never walk again
quotes.author: Beatrice

quotes.text: Maybe I will just sit here and bleed for a while...
quotes.author: Sister Yasmine

quotes.text: Don't fuck it up.
quotes.author: Mother Superion

quotes.text: Sisters Warriors don't run! Sisters Warriors don't run!
quotes.author: Sister Yasmine

quotes.text: I had a feeling that she'd be a handful.
quotes.author: Beatrice

quotes.text: God is everything I do and all my work glorifies him
quotes.author: Sister Camila

quotes.text: Oh... You were thinking blindfold...
quotes.author: Sister Camila

quotes.text: Easy on the eyes... what are you? Seventy?
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: I stare at her perfect normality until I wake up and realize I've still been the freak I've been my whole life. What I've learned since then is life has a fucked up way of making her dreams come true.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: You could teach me how to dance. I could teach you how to drink.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: If I left, would you come with me?
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: Of course I hated her, she was my sister.
quotes.author: Shotgun Mary

quotes.text: The problem with having all of that knowledge is that sometimes you have to use it
quotes.author: Mother Superion

quotes.text: I know I should be grateful. A lot of people would kill to have this sort of thing happened to them. But you can't blame me for being confused.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: Okay I hate to break it to you but I'm no hunter,I'm not even a gatherer, a week ago, I couldn't even walk.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: Perhaps God has spared you in that accident for a reason. A greater purpose.
quotes.author: Father Vincent

quotes.text: In this life or the next?
quotes.author: Ava to Beatrice

quotes.text: In this life or the next,
quotes.author: Beatrice to Ava

quotes.text: You're no angel.
quotes.author: Ava Silva

quotes.text: You can't beat me.
quotes.author: Adriel

quotes.text: We know. We don't need to beat you. We only needed seven minutes,
quotes.author: Shotgun Mary, Sister Lilith and Sister Beatrice

quotes.text: Yeah Yeah, we assumed that meant you knew how to drive!
quotes.author: Sister Camila to Yasmine

quotes.text: Oh you UNHOLY BITCHâ€¦
quotes.author: Cardinal Foster

quotes.text: Better not test me, then
quotes.author: Beatrice

quotes.text: They can't beat us Bea. Not together.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: Do you think this is easy for me? Do you think my choices are clear? I'm doing the best I can!
quotes.author: Ava to Beatrice

quotes.text: Lilith you bitch!!
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: A lot of people can smile when things go wrong, but it takes a special person to make everyone else smile with them.
quotes.author: Sister Beatrice to Sister Camila

quotes.text: Reya... missed me again.
quotes.author: Adriel

quotes.text: Grizzled. Mean scar. Grand entrance. Boss bitch is here.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: No smile, unreadable expression, not actively hostile. I can work with that.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: Nice job, patriarchy. All the heroes are women, but the cake-topper is a dude.
quotes.author: Ava

quotes.text: In this house, trust is everything. You have to know your fellow Sister Warriors have your back. Lives depend on it.
quotes.author: Mother Superion

quotes.text: I can have patience. I can be calm. Come on, you stupid shift change!
quotes.author: Sister Camila
